text: The 1916–17 Loyola Ramblers men's basketball team represents Loyola University Chicago during the 1916–17 college men's basketball season. The team finished the season with an overall record of 1–3. ==Schedule== |- ==References== Category:Loyola Ramblers men's basketball seasons Loyola Ramblers Loyola Ramblers Loyola Ramblers
title: 1916–17 Loyola Ramblers men's basketball team
